thread.title: DTS to Buy Radio Firm iBiquity for $172 Million
thread.title_full: DTS to Buy Radio Firm iBiquity for $172 Million - WSJ

author: Lisa Beilfuss
title: DTS to Buy Radio Firm iBiquity for $172 Million
text:
Audio-technology company DTS Inc. on Wednesday said it would acquire HD radio technology firm iBiquity Digital Corp. for $172 million, a move to capitalize on broadcast radioâ€™s digital upgrade.
Privately held iBiquity, which counts radio broadcasters iHeartMedia and CBS Radio among its investors, was formed when USA Digital Radio merged with...
